verses.verse: Now<WG1161> it happened<WG1096> on<WG1722> the second<WG1207> Sabbath<WG4521> after the first,<WG1207> that<WG1279> he<WG846> was going<WG1279> through<WG1223> the grain fields.<WG4702> His<WG846> disciples<WG3101> plucked<WG5089> the heads of grain,<WG4719> and<WG2532> ate,<WG2068> rubbing<WG5597> them in<WG5495> their hands.<WG5495>

But<WG1161> some<WG5100> of the Pharisees<WG5330> said<WG2036> to them,<WG846> "Why<WG5101> do you<WG4160> do that which<WG3739> is<WG1832> not<WG3756> lawful<WG1832> to do<WG4160> on<WG1722> the Sabbath day?<WG4521>"

Jesus,<WG2424> answering<WG611> <WG4314> them,<WG846> said,<WG2036> "Haven't<WG3761> you<WG314> read<WG314> <WG3761> <WG5124> what<WG3739> David<WG1138> did<WG4160> when<WG3698> he was hungry,<WG3983> he,<WG846> and<WG2532> those who<WG3588> were<WG5607> with<WG3326> him;<WG846>

how<WG5613> he entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the house<WG3624> of God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> took<WG2983> and<WG2532> ate<WG5315> the show bread,<WG4286> and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> also<WG2532> to those who were<WG3588> with<WG3326> him,<WG846> which<WG3739> is<WG1832> not<WG3756> lawful<WG1832> to eat<WG5315> except<WG3361> for<WG1487> the priests<WG2409> alone?<WG3441>"
He<WG2532> said<WG3004> to them,<WG846> "The<WG3754> Son<WG5207> of Man<WG444> is<WG2076> lord<WG2962> of<WG2532> the Sabbath.<WG4521>"

It<WG1161> also<WG2532> happened<WG1096> on<WG1722> another<WG2087> Sabbath<WG4521> that he<WG846> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the synagogue<WG4864> and<WG2532> taught.<WG1321> There<WG1563> was<WG2258> a<WG2532> man<WG444> there,<WG1563> and<WG2532> his right<WG1188> hand<WG5495> was<WG2258> withered.<WG3584>

The<WG1161> scribes<WG1122> and<WG1161> the Pharisees<WG5330> watched<WG3906> him,<WG846> to see whether<WG1487> he would heal<WG2323> on<WG1722> the Sabbath,<WG4521> that<WG2443> they might find<WG2147> an accusation<WG2724> against him.<WG846>

But<WG1161> he<WG846> knew<WG1492> their<WG846> thoughts;<WG1261> and<WG2532> he said<WG2036> to the man<WG444> who had<WG2192> the withered<WG3584> hand,<WG5495> "Rise up,<WG1453> and<WG2532> stand<WG2476> in<WG1519> the middle.<WG3319>" He arose<WG450> and<WG1161> stood.<WG2476>

Then<WG3767> Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> to<WG4314> them,<WG846> "I will ask<WG1905> you<WG5209> something:<WG5101> Is it lawful<WG1832> on the Sabbath<WG4521> to do good,<WG15> or<WG2228> to do harm?<WG2554> To save<WG4982> a life,<WG5590> or<WG2228> to kill?<WG622>"

He<WG2532> looked around at<WG4017> them<WG846> all,<WG3956> and said<WG2036> to the man,<WG444> "Stretch out<WG1614> your<WG4675> hand.<WG5495>" He<WG1161> did,<WG4160> and<WG1161> his<WG846> hand<WG5495> was restored<WG600> as<WG5613> sound<WG5199> as<WG5613> the other.<WG243>
But<WG1161> they<WG846> were filled<WG4130> with rage,<WG454> and<WG2532> talked<WG1255> with<WG4314> one another<WG240> about what<WG302> they<WG5101> might do<WG4160> to Jesus.<WG2424>

It<WG1161> happened<WG1096> in<WG1722> these<WG3778> days,<WG2250> that he went out<WG1831> to<WG1519> the mountain<WG3735> to pray,<WG4336> and<WG2532> he continued<WG2258> all night<WG1273> in<WG1722> prayer<WG4335> to God.<WG2316>

When<WG3753> it was<WG1096> day,<WG2250> he called<WG4377> his<WG846> disciples,<WG3101> and<WG2532> from<WG575> them<WG846> he chose<WG1586> twelve,<WG1427> whom<WG3739> he also<WG2532> named<WG3687> apostles:<WG652>
Simon,<WG4613> whom<WG3739> he<WG3687> also<WG2532> named<WG3687> Peter;<WG4074> Andrew,<WG406> his<WG846> brother;<WG80> James;<WG2385> John;<WG2491> Philip;<WG5376> Bartholomew;<WG918>
Matthew;<WG3156> Thomas;<WG2381> James,<WG2385> the<WG3588> son of Alphaeus;<WG256> Simon,<WG4613> who was called<WG2564> the<WG3588> Zealot;<WG2207>
Judas<WG2455> the son of James;<WG2385> and<WG2532> Judas<WG2455> Iscariot,<WG2469> who<WG3739> also<WG2532> became<WG1096> a traitor.<WG4273>

He<WG2532> came down<WG2597> with<WG3326> them,<WG846> and stood<WG2476> on<WG1909> a<WG5117> level place,<WG3977> with<WG2532> a crowd<WG3793> of his<WG846> disciples,<WG3101> and<WG2532> a great<WG4183> number<WG4128> of the people<WG2992> from<WG575> all<WG3956> Judea<WG2449> and<WG2532> Jerusalem,<WG2419> and<WG2532> the sea coast<WG3882> of Tyre<WG5184> and<WG2532> Sidon,<WG4605> who<WG3739> came<WG2064> to hear<WG191> him<WG846> and<WG2532> to be healed<WG2390> of<WG575> their<WG846> diseases;<WG3554>
as<WG2532> well as those who were troubled<WG3791> by<WG5259> unclean<WG169> spirits,<WG4151> and<WG2532> they were being healed.<WG2323>
All<WG3956> the multitude<WG3793> sought<WG2212> to touch<WG680> him,<WG846> for<WG3754> power<WG1411> came<WG1831> out<WG3844> from him<WG846> and<WG2532> healed<WG2390> them all.<WG3956>

He<WG846> lifted up<WG1869> his<WG846> eyes<WG3788> to his<WG846> disciples,<WG3101> and<WG2532> said,<WG3004> "Blessed<WG3107> are you who are poor,<WG4434> for<WG3754> yours<WG5212> is<WG2076> the Kingdom<WG932> of God.<WG2316>
Blessed<WG3107> are you who hunger<WG3983> now,<WG3568> for<WG3754> you will be filled.<WG5526> Blessed<WG3107> are you who weep<WG2799> now,<WG3568> for<WG3754> you will laugh.<WG1070>

Blessed<WG3107> are you<WG2075> when<WG3752> men<WG444> shall hate<WG3404> you,<WG5209> and<WG2532> when<WG3752> they shall exclude<WG873> and<WG2532> mock<WG3679> you,<WG5209> and<WG2532> throw out<WG1544> your<WG5216> name<WG3686> as<WG5613> evil,<WG4190> for<WG1752> the Son<WG5207> of Man<WG444>'s sake.<WG5207>

Rejoice<WG5463> in<WG1722> that<WG1565> day,<WG2250> and<WG2532> leap for joy,<WG4640> for<WG1063> behold,<WG2400> your<WG5216> reward<WG3408> is great<WG4183> in<WG1722> heaven,<WG3772> for<WG1063> their<WG846> fathers<WG3962> did<WG4160> the<WG2596> same<WG5023> thing<WG5024> to the prophets.<WG4396>
"But<WG4133> woe<WG3759> to you<WG5213> who are rich!<WG4145> For<WG3754> you have received<WG568> your<WG5216> consolation.<WG3874>

Woe<WG3759> to you,<WG5213> you who are full<WG1705> now,<WG3754> for you<WG5213> will be hungry.<WG3759> Woe to you<WG5213> who laugh<WG1070> now,<WG3568> for<WG3754> you will mourn<WG3996> and<WG2532> weep.<WG2799>

Woe,<WG3759> <WG5213> when<WG3752> <WG3956> men<WG444> speak<WG2036> well<WG2573> of you,<WG5213> for<WG1063> their<WG846> fathers<WG3962> did<WG4160> the<WG5024> same<WG5023> thing<WG2596> to the false prophets.<WG5578>
"But<WG235> I tell<WG3004> you<WG5213> who hear:<WG191> love<WG25> your<WG5216> enemies,<WG2190> do<WG4160> good<WG2573> to those who hate<WG3404> you,<WG5209>
bless<WG2127> those who curse<WG2672> you,<WG5213> and<WG2532> pray<WG4336> for<WG5228> those who mistreat<WG1908> you.<WG5209>

To him who strikes<WG5180> you<WG4571> on<WG1909> the<WG4600> cheek,<WG4600> offer<WG3930> also<WG2532> the other;<WG243> and<WG2532> from him<WG575> who takes away<WG142> your<WG4675> cloak,<WG2440> don't<WG3361> withhold<WG2967> your coat<WG5509> also.<WG2532>
Give<WG1325> to everyone<WG3956> who asks<WG154> you,<WG4571> and<WG2532> don't<WG3361> ask<WG523> <WG575> him who takes away<WG142> your goods<WG4674> to give them back again.<WG523>
<WG2532> "As<WG2531> you would<WG2309> like<WG2443> people<WG444> to do to<WG4160> you,<WG5213> do<WG4160> <WG5210> exactly<WG3668> so<WG2532> to them.<WG846>

<WG2532> If<WG1487> you love<WG25> those who love<WG25> you,<WG5213> what<WG4169> credit<WG5485> is<WG2076> that to you?<WG5213> For<WG1063> even<WG2532> sinners<WG268> love<WG25> those who love<WG25> them.<WG846>

<WG2532> If<WG1437> you do good<WG15> to those who do good<WG15> to you,<WG5209> what<WG4169> credit<WG5485> is<WG2076> that to you?<WG5213> For<WG1063> even<WG2532> sinners<WG268> do<WG4160> the same.<WG846>

<WG2532> If<WG1437> you lend<WG1155> to those from<WG3844> whom<WG3739> you hope<WG1679> to receive,<WG618> what<WG4169> credit<WG5485> is<WG2076> that to you?<WG5213> Even<WG2532> sinners<WG268> lend<WG1155> to sinners,<WG268> to<WG2443> receive<WG618> back<WG2470> as much.<WG2470>

But<WG4133> love<WG25> your<WG5216> enemies,<WG2190> and<WG2532> do good,<WG15> and<WG2532> lend,<WG1155> expecting<WG560> nothing<WG3367> back;<WG560> and<WG2532> your<WG5216> reward<WG3408> will be<WG2071> great,<WG4183> and<WG2532> you will be<WG2071> children<WG5207> of the Most High;<WG5310> for<WG3754> he<WG846> is<WG2076> kind<WG5543> toward<WG1909> the unthankful<WG884> and<WG2532> evil.<WG4190>
Therefore<WG3767> be<WG1096> merciful,<WG3629> even as<WG2531> your<WG5216> Father<WG3962> is<WG2076> also<WG2532> merciful.<WG3629>

Don't<WG3361> judge,<WG2919> and<WG2532> you<WG2919> won't<WG3756> <WG3361> be judged.<WG2919> Don't<WG3361> condemn,<WG2613> and<WG2532> you<WG2613> won't<WG3756> <WG3361> be condemned.<WG2613> Set free,<WG630> and<WG2532> you will be set free.<WG630>

"Give,<WG1325> and<WG2532> it will be given<WG1325> to you:<WG5213> good<WG2570> measure,<WG3358> pressed down,<WG4085> shaken<WG2532> together,<WG4531> and<WG2532> running over,<WG5240> will be given<WG1325> to<WG1519> you.<WG5216> <WG2859> For<WG1063> with the same<WG846> measure<WG3358> you<WG3739> measure<WG3354> it will be measured<WG488> back<WG488> to you.<WG5213>"

He<WG1161> spoke<WG2036> a parable<WG3850> to them.<WG3385> "Can<WG1410> the blind<WG5185> guide<WG3594> the blind?<WG5185> Won't<WG3780> they<WG4098> both<WG297> fall<WG4098> into<WG1519> a pit?<WG999>

A disciple<WG3101> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> above<WG5228> his<WG846> teacher,<WG1320> but<WG1161> everyone<WG3956> when he is fully trained<WG2675> will be<WG2071> like<WG5613> his<WG846> teacher.<WG1320>

Why<WG5101> do you<WG991> see the speck<WG2595> of chaff that is in<WG1722> your<WG4675> brother<WG80>'s eye,<WG3788> but don't<WG3756> consider<WG2657> the beam<WG1385> that is in<WG1722> your own<WG2398> eye?<WG3788>

Or<WG2228> how<WG4459> can<WG1410> you tell<WG3004><WG99999> your<WG4675> brother,<WG80> <WG80> 'Brother, let me<WG863> remove<WG1544> the speck<WG2595> of chaff that is in<WG1722> your<WG4675> eye,<WG3788>' when you<WG991> yourself<WG846> don't<WG3756> see<WG991> the beam<WG1385> that is in<WG1722> your own<WG4675> eye?<WG3788> You hypocrite!<WG5273> First<WG4412> remove<WG1544> the beam<WG1385> from<WG1537> your own<WG4675> eye,<WG3788> and<WG2532> then<WG5119> you can see clearly<WG1227> to remove<WG1544> the speck<WG2595> of chaff that is in<WG1722> your<WG4675> brother<WG80>'s eye.<WG3788>

For<WG1063> there is no<WG3756> good<WG2570> tree<WG1186> that<WG2076> brings<WG4160> forth<WG4160> rotten<WG4550> fruit;<WG2590> nor<WG3761> again a rotten<WG4550> tree<WG1186> that<WG4160> brings forth<WG4160> good<WG2570> fruit.<WG2590>

For<WG1063> each<WG1538> tree<WG1186> is known<WG1097> by<WG1537> its own<WG2398> fruit.<WG2590> For<WG1063> people<WG4816> don't<WG3756> gather<WG4816> figs<WG4810> from<WG1537> thorns,<WG173> nor<WG3761> do they<WG5166> gather grapes<WG4718> from<WG1537> a bramble bush.<WG942>

The good<WG18> man<WG444> out of<WG1537> the good<WG18> treasure<WG2344> of his<WG846> heart<WG2588> brings out<WG4393> that which is good,<WG18> and<WG2532> the evil<WG4190> man<WG444> out of<WG1537> the evil<WG4190> treasure<WG2344> of his<WG846> heart<WG2588> brings out<WG4393> that which is evil,<WG4190> for<WG1063> out of<WG1537> the abundance<WG4051> of the heart,<WG2588> his<WG846> mouth<WG4750> speaks.<WG2980>
<WG1161> "Why<WG5101> do you<WG2564> call me,<WG3165> <WG2962> 'Lord, Lord,<WG2962>' and<WG2532> don't<WG3756> do<WG4160> the things which<WG3739> I say?<WG3004>

Everyone<WG3956> who comes<WG2064> to<WG4314> me,<WG3165> and<WG2532> hears<WG191> my<WG3450> words,<WG3056> and<WG2532> does<WG4160> them,<WG846> I will show<WG5263> you<WG5213> who<WG5101> he is<WG2076> like.<WG3664>

He is<WG2076> like<WG3664> a man<WG444> building<WG3739> a<WG3618> house,<WG3614> who<WG2532> dug<WG4626> and went deep,<WG900> and<WG2532> laid<WG5087> a foundation<WG2310> on<WG1909> the rock.<WG4073> When<WG1161> a flood<WG4132> arose,<WG1096> the stream<WG4215> broke<WG4366> against that<WG1565> house,<WG3614> and<WG2532> could<WG2480> not<WG3756> shake<WG4531> it,<WG846> because<WG1063> it was founded<WG2311> on<WG1909> the rock.<WG4073>

But<WG1161> he who hears,<WG191> and<WG2532> doesn't<WG3361> do,<WG4160> is<WG2076> like<WG3664> a man<WG444> who built<WG3618> a house<WG3614> on<WG1909> the earth<WG1093> without<WG5565> a foundation,<WG2310> against<WG4366> which<WG3739> the stream<WG4215> broke,<WG4366> and<WG2532> immediately<WG2112> it fell,<WG4098> and<WG2532> the ruin<WG4485> of that<WG1565> house<WG3614> was<WG1096> great.<WG3173>"
